verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] welcomed the first African leader to visit the White House during his presidency , Nigeria 's Muhammadu Buhari .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: welcomed] [ARG1: the first African leader to visit the White House during his presidency , Nigeria 's Muhammadu Buhari] .
President Donald Trump has welcomed [ARG0: the first African leader] to [V: visit] [ARG1: the White House] [ARGM-TMP: during his presidency] , Nigeria 's Muhammadu Buhari .
